description: Governor Sergei Furgal of Khabarovsk has been replaced, after his arrest sparked mass demonstrations.
title: Sergei Furgal protests: Putin picks new governor after murder allegation
title_page: Sergei Furgal protests: Putin picks new governor after murder allegation - BBC News
maintext: The LDPR is an opposition party, although it is usually seen as loyal to the Kremlin. Mr Furgal however has proved to be popular in the region, winning the governorship in 2018 by a landslide - beating a candidate from Mr Putin's own party.
